snippet: Florida Coach Will Muschamp said Treon Harris would share snaps against Missouri on Saturday with the junior Jeff Driskel, who has eight turnovers in the last three games.
abstract: Florida coach Will Muschamp says freshman quarterback Treon Harris will share snaps with junior Jeff Driskel.
lead_paragraph: Florida Coach Will Muschamp said Treon Harris would share snaps against Missouri on Saturday with the junior Jeff Driskel, who has eight turnovers in the last three games.

headline.main: Florida Freshman Will Get Time at Quarterback
headline.print_headline: Florida Freshman Will Share Quarterback Role
